name: NeonRoad (Physon)
description:
Go as fast as long as you can on this infinite road made of laser.

Neon road has been made for the Dream Arcade Archive game jam. It was done in two days even if it was a nine days jam.

Can be played alone or with another person.

A D to move player one Arrow keys to move player two C to Change point of view of player one LeftCrtl to Change point of view of player two

Music :

Shiny Tech II by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4348-shiny-tech-ii
